items.name: Potion of Healing
items.description: Regain 2d4+2 hit points when you drink this potion.

items.name: Potion of Healing (Greater)
items.description: Regain 4d4+4 hit points when you drink this potion.

items.name: Potion of Healing (Superior)
items.description: Regain 8d4+8 hit points when you drink this potion.

items.name: Potion of Healing (Supreme)
items.description: Regain 10d4+20 hit points when you drink this potion.

items.name: Antitoxin
items.description: Advantage on saving throws against poison for 1 hour.

items.name: Potion of Climbing
items.description: Gain a climbing speed equal to your walking speed for 1 hour.

items.name: Oil of Slipperiness
items.description: Gain Freedom of Movement effect for 8 hours, or create Grease effect.
